definition: to win every trick in a card game/grand slam/fig. total success
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash

sentences.english: Serena is the fourth different Grand Slam Champion on the woman's side this year.
sentences.chinese: 小威是今年女網中的第四個單站大滿貫冠軍。

sentences.english: Wimbledon is the only Grand Slam to still be played on grass.
sentences.chinese: 溫布爾登是唯一的草地大滿貫。

sentences.english: Five no-trump asked North to pick a slam.
sentences.chinese: 5NT是讓北家選擇一個滿貫定約。

sentences.english: Steffi Graf concluded her Grand Slam tennis season by winning Olympic gold.
sentences.chinese: 格拉芙以一枚奧運金牌結束了自己大滿貫的網球賽季。

sentences.english: Robinson was 28 when he arrived in the majors.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓森參加大滿貫賽時已經28歲了。

sentences.english: I am sure he is going to win a Slam soon. He deserves to.
sentences.chinese: 我確定他很快會贏得滿貫，那是他該得的。

sentences.english: John's working on a small slam.
sentences.chinese: 約翰正努力打滿小滿貫。

sentences.english: South will still be one trick short of the slam .
sentences.chinese: 南要打成小滿貫仍缺少一墩。

sentences.english: Czech teen Vaidisova is looking for her first Grand Slam title.
sentences.chinese: 捷克小將瓦娃在期待她的第一個大滿貫。

sentences.english: Mr. A had a grand-slam year with his promotion and wedding.
sentences.chinese: 先生的晉升和結婚，算是滿貫的一年。

sentences.english: I do feel, that I have the strength to win GSs .
sentences.chinese: 我覺得，我是有潛力可以再拿滿貫的。

sentences.english: How do you get your gear ready for a two-week Grand Slam?
sentences.chinese: 你對兩個星期的大滿貫比賽準備得如何？

sentences.english: It already has Major Championships and successful golf tours all around the world.
sentences.chinese: 它已經在世界各地成功舉辦大滿貫賽和高爾夫巡迴賽。

sentences.english: "The other side is very lucky, " he said after the grand slam.
sentences.chinese: 對手實在非常幸運”在滿貫全壘打後他也這麼表示。

sentences.english: At continued last China can avowal of a tennis player in a Grand Slam final.
sentences.chinese: 中國終於能夠在網球大滿貫賽上揚眉吐氣了。

sentences.english: Zheng Jie yesterday became the first Chinese singles player to get through to the semi-final of a major tennis competition.
sentences.chinese: 昨天鄭潔成爲了第一位晉級大滿貫半決賽的中國選手。

definition: Ever Victorious Army (1860-1864), Qing dynasty army equipped and trained jointly with Europeans and used esp. against the Taiping rebels
Lee Lai-Shan (1970-), former windsurfing world champion from Hong Kong
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
